name: Jony doesn´t feel well
description:
Jony is a homeless that have all kind of diseases, we are the last white blood cell inside his body and we have to defend him from death.

This game is a project for a unity course, is in development and i would like to know your opinion.

Controls
  • Aim - Mouse
  • Shoot - Left mouse click
  • Dash - Space
  • Move - WASD
  • Interact - E
  • Menu - Esc
